i1.name: Draw_a_Bead
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Tristana's''' [[basic attack]]s, {{ai|Explosive Charge|Tristana}} and {{ai|Buster Shot|Tristana}} gain {{sti|attack range|{{pp|0 to 136}} '''bonus''' range}}, for a total of {{pp|525 to 661}}.
i1.descriptionHtml: Innate: Tristana's basic attacks, Tristana's Explosive Charge and Tristana's Buster Shot gain 0 − 136 (based on level) bonus range, for a total of 525 − 661 (based on level).

q1.name: Rapid_Fire
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Tristana''' empowers her cannon, gaining {{sti|Attack speed|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 7 seconds.
q1.descriptionHtml: Active: Tristana empowers her cannon, gaining bonus attack speed for 7 seconds.
q1.notes: * ''Rapid Fire'' is a non-refreshing buff that will not update on rank-up.

w1.name: Rocket_Jump
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Tristana''' {{tip|dash|jumps}} to the target location, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies on impact and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 60%.
Scoring a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy {{tip|champion}} or detonating {{ai|Explosive Charge|Tristana}} at maximum stacks on a champion resets ''Rocket Jump's'' {{sti|cooldown}}.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Tristana jumps to the target location, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies on impact and slowing them by 60%.
Scoring a takedown against an enemy champion or detonating Tristana's Explosive Charge at maximum stacks on a champion resets Rocket Jump's cooldown.
w1.notes:
* '''Tristana''' can still use her [[champion ability|abilities]], [[summoner spell]]s, and [[active ability items|item actives]] during ''Rocket Jump''.
* ''Rocket Jump's'' dash speed depends on the distance of the jump. Close-ranged jumps are much shorter while long-ranged jumps leave '''Tristana''' in the air significantly longer.
* If '''Tristana''' has less than 850 movement speed, a full-range ''Rocket Jump'' (including its cast time) will make her arrive quicker at its destination than walking at this speed could.
* Killing {{tip|clone|clones}} or detonating {{ai|Explosive Charge|Tristana}} on them also resets ''Rocket Jump's'' cooldown.
** The former may be unintended.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 50% AP)
  • Slow Duration:

e1.name: Explosive_Charge
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} Enemies explode when [[kill]]ed by '''Tristana's''' basic attacks, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Tristana''' launches an explosive charge at the target enemy, including {{tip|turret|turrets}}, which upon arrival attaches to them for 4 seconds. Afterwards, the charge detonates, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to nearby enemies, including turrets. The explosion radius is doubled when the charge is placed on a turret.

'''Tristana's''' [[basic attack]]s {{tip|on-hit}} and [[champion ability|abilities]] against the target increase ''Explosive Charge's'' damage by 30%, [[stack]]ing up to 4 times for a maximum 120% increase, upon which the charge also detonates instantly.
The charge's '''total''' damage is additionally increased by {{as|{{pp|key=%|key1=%|type=critical strike chance|0 to 33.3 for 11|0 to 100|formula=0.333%*critical strike chance, capped at 33.3% increase}}|critical chance}}.
''If {{ai|R|Tristana}} is used to apply the last stack, the detonation will instead be delayed until the end of the {{tip|airborne|knock back}} or the 4 seconds expire.''
'''''Tristana''' will attempt to basic attack the target afterwards.''
e1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Enemies explode when killed by Tristana's basic attacks, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.
Active: Tristana launches an explosive charge at the target enemy, including turrets, which upon arrival attaches to them for 4 seconds. Afterwards, the charge detonates, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies, including turrets. The explosion radius is doubled when the charge is placed on a turret.
Tristana's basic attacks on-hit and champion ability against the target increase Explosive Charge's damage by 30%, stacking up to 4 times for a maximum 120% increase, upon which the charge also detonates instantly.
The charge's total damage is additionally increased by 0 to 100 ‒ undefined.
If Tristana's R is used to apply the last stack, the detonation will instead be delayed until the end of the knock back or the 4 seconds expire.
Tristana will attempt to basic attack the target afterwards.
leveling: {{st|Minimum Physical Damage|{{ap|70 to 110}} {{as|(+ {{ap|50 to 150}}% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}}}
e1.notes:
* ''Explosive Charge's'' cast time is always 100% of the caster's attack windup time.
** At base attack speed, '''Tristana's''' attack windup is {{fd|0.225625}} seconds.
** An easy formula to calculate the cast time is [ {{fd|0.14801}} seconds divided by {{as|'''total''' attack speed|attack speed}} ].
** Reducing '''Tristana's''' attack speed via {{tip|cripple|attack speed reductions}} also increases ''Explosive Charge's'' cast time by the same fraction.
** It is calculated from '''Tristana's''' total attack speed after cap (2.5) and floor (0.2), making the maximum possible cast time {{rutngt|0.74005}}.
* '''Tristana''' will be automatically ordered to basic attack the target.
* ''Explosive Charge's'' initial application deals 0 {{as|physical|physical damage}} {{tt|damage|sourcetype pending for test, but probably proc}}, triggering {{tip|turret}} aggro.
** It also triggers a [[stack]] of effects such as {{ri|Electrocute}}.
* All explosions by ''Explosive Charge's'' passive count as the same cast instance. Every cast of the active is a separate cast instance:
** Hitting a champion with the passive by killing a nearby unit, casting the active on them (see note above) and landing a basic attack against them triggers {{ri|Electrocute}}.
** Hitting a champion with the passive by killing a nearby unit, casting the active on them and hitting them again with the Passive by killing another nearby unit does '''not''' trigger {{ri|Electrocute}}.
* {{tip|Dodge}}, {{tip|block}} and {{tip|blind}} all prevent ''Explosive Charge's'' stack application via basic attacks.
* ''Explosive Charge's'' detonation will deal damage to the primary target even if they have become {{tip|untargetable}}.
* ''Explosive Charge's'' stacks from basic attacks are applied as an [[on-hit]] effect and will therefore interact with {{iis|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} Phantom Hit and {{iis|Runaan's Hurricane}} bolts.
{{Unit-targeted cancel conditions}}

effects.str: • Minimum Physical Damage: (+ % bonus AD) (+ 50% AP)

r1.name: Buster_Shot
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Tristana''' fires a massive cannonball at the target enemy that upon arrival deals {{as|magic damage}} to them and {{tip|airborne|knocks back}} and {{tip|stun|stuns}} all enemies around them, including the target, {{tt|for up-to {{fd|0.75}} seconds.|See notes}}
r1.descriptionHtml: Active: Tristana fires a massive cannonball at the target enemy that upon arrival deals magic damage to them and knocks back and stuns all enemies around them, including the target, for up-to 0.75 seconds.
r1.notes:
* Applies {{tip|spell damage}} to the primary target and deals 0 {{tip|default damage}} to secondary targets.
** The 0 damage to secondary targets triggers {{tip|turret}} aggro, but does not stack {{ai|Explosive Charge|Tristana}}.
* '''Tristana''' will automatically be ordered to attack the target of ''Buster Shot''.
* ''Buster Shot's'' {{tip|airborne|displacement}} direction is based on '''Tristana's''' location at the end of the cast time.
** The primary target is pushed in a straight line away from that location, but the knockback distance and speed may be impeded by terrain.
** Secondary targets are displaced parallel to the primary target's displacement.
* The {{tip|airborne|icononly = true}} {{tip|stun|crowd control}} is removed early when the forced movement stops.
** At normal knockback distance and knockback speed, this changes the duration of the disable to circa {{fd|0.4}} / {{fd|0.5}} / {{fd|0.6}} seconds by default.
* {{tip|Displacement immunity}} will also resist the application of the {{tip|stun}}.
{{Unit-targeted cancel conditions}}
